name: inherit
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: inherit
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to receive money, a house, etc. from someone after they have died

example.eg: Who will inherit the house when he dies?
All her children will inherit equally.
example.egtrans: 她所有的子女将平分遗产。

dsense.name: inherit
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to be born with the same physical or mental characteristics as one of your parents or grandparents

example.eg: Rosie inherited her red hair from her mother.
example.egtrans: 罗茜那头红发遗传自她母亲。

dsense.name: inherit
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to begin to have responsibility for a problem or situation that previously existed or belonged to another person
trans_examp.trans_cn: 接手，承担（遗留的问题等）

example.eg: When I took on the job of manager, I inherited certain financial problems.
example.egtrans: 我担任经理时接手了一些遗留的财务问题。
